component.name: BrowseStationListPanel
component.script:
sub init() m.top.observeField("focusedChild", "focusChanged")
m.top.panelSize = "medium" m.top.focusable = true m.top.hasNextPanel = false
list = m.top.findNode("stationlist") list.content = m.top.stations m.top.list = list m.top.list.observefield("itemSelected", "itemSelected") end sub
function focusChanged() 'if m.top.isInFocusChain() m.top.list.setFocus(true) 'end if end function
function stationsSet(event) stations = event.getData() m.top.list.content = stations end function
function itemSelected(event) index = event.getData() station = m.top.stations.getChild(index) m.stationDetails = m.top.createChild("StationDetailPanel") m.stationDetails.station = station m.top.nextPanel = m.stationDetails end function
